comment._content: President of Columbia University, Mayor of New York City; his wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seth_Low

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content:
Seth Low had been appointed by Pres. Woodrow Wilson on December 1, 1914 to head a Commission concerned with the Colorado miners strike ("the Low Commission").
He is probably photographed here in connection with his testimony to the Walsh Commission  (Commission on Industrial Relations) on February 6, 1915 at the Metropolitan Building in New York.
